name: poison-barb
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Poison moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Poison-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This small, poisonous barb boosts the power of Poison-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This small, poisonous barb boosts the power of Poison-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This small, poisonous barb boosts the power of Poison-type moves.
